item.title: CVE-2024-33951|2024-05-02T11:31:02.564Z -- Adam DeHaven -- Perfect Pullquotes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Adam DeHaven Perfect Pullquotes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Perfect Pullquotes: from n/a through 1.7.5.
